title: Is the slay belle icon the same as the 2013 one (Riot plz clear this up for us)
body:
Just as a followup from xXDarkAngelXx550's post, people who unlock the slay belle icon are not receiving it. people say its because it is the same as last years one but the picture advertised is quite different. picture comparison included.

is this the same icon and is advertised wrongly, or do we get a second one? thanks

[Edit] It doesn't matter if it is the same or not, i just want the confusion lifted so people know one way or the other.

replies.body: u must main lee sin and be blind
How am i blind? can you not see the differences in the coloration of the icon?
riot so lazy, reusing last years icon.

Oh so you don't know, then why the %%%% did you comment this?
http://i.gyazo.com/d9d44dbf8017d646ad4a1d797b535a87.png

Sit down.

The icon is the same as last year.

It's the same icon as last year.

Tested it on my smurf.

So explain why the icon advertised this year is so different in design than the previous one?
the other two poro icons advertised looked identical to the ones we got why is this different?

Who knows?
Maybe they Riot art department just wanted to darken the icon for display?
Maybe it's being replaced like the rose, ribbers, claw and seedling.


Who really cares? It's a crap icon to begin with.

Yea they are pretty different now i look at them side by side.
